question.text: Does the study have a title page (Protocol title, PI, Co-investigators, Location study will be conducted)?
question.contingency-template: Reason: the study does not have a title page.

question.text: Does the study have a background and rationale?
Does the study include hypothesis, specific aims, or objectives?
Does the study require a study population (if appropriate, inclusion/exclusion criteria)?
Does the study have risks/benefits (if human subjects are involved or identifiable data will be used)?
Does the study have risks/benefits (if human subjects are involved or identifiable data will be used)?
Does the study have risks/benefits (if human subjects are involved or identifiable data will be used)?
Does the study use UAMS pharmacy?
